title: Mahindra's Classic Legends to pump in â‚¹1,000 crore till FY26 to rev up business
description: Classic Legends is also working on a pure electric motorcycle for the UK, Europe and other mature markets. Developed ground-up with the University of Warwick, the model will go on sale from 2024. The company claims that it will be the most affordable e-motorcycle in its segment.
